author: Alastair Lockhart
description: Halifax said that although wages have risen by just 2.7%, house prices have risen by 16.8% since the pandemic began. The average UK house price is £239,281, while typical earnings are £39,374
title: Cost of a typical family home soars to record seven times average earnings
content:
